sentences.sentence: She uses these pulses to determine how to polarise the photons she sends back.
sentences.translation: 她利用这些脉冲检查她送回的光量子是如何极化的。

sentences.sentence: Events behind the barbed wire at Fort Bragg continue to polarise opinion.

sentences.sentence: The green debate tends to polarise into science-as-saviour versus science-as-devil camps.
